description:
New-ID:  NBI62

This data set presents a classification of African closed moist
tropical forest for Gabon.

The Africa Closed Moist Tropical Forest Dataset documentation

File:    GABONVEG.E00       Code:  123001-001

Vector Member
The files are in Arc/Info Export format and should be imported
with the Arc/Info command Import cover In-Filename Out-Filename.

REMARK: The export files include annotation. however it is not
possible to import the files with it. We had to edit in the export
file (E00) just before the annotation the TXT command in TX8. The
annotations are then lost but the file can import without problems.

The Africa Closed Moist Tropical Forest dataset is a compilation
of national maps into comparable units by the World Conservation and
Monitoring Centre (WCMC) in Great-Britain.  The maps were taken for
each country for Africa from national maps and legend units were
grouped to come upto 13 classes, describing forest types.

Contact : UNEP/GRID-Nairobi, P O Box 30552, Nairobi, Kenya

In total 13 classes are compiled
10    = Water bodies                                              130  =
Degradated Rain Forest
111  = Mangroves                                              500 = Dry
Forest
112  = Degradated Mangroves                             510 = Pine Forest
113  =  Inland Swamp Forest
114  =  Degradated inland Samp Forest               900 = Non Forest
121  = Montane Rain  Forest                                 999 = No Data
122  = Lowland Rain Forest
123  = Sun Montane Rain Forest
In almost all coverages water bodies are
labelled as 0

References:

WCMC Biodiversity Map Library. Closed Moist Tropical Forests and
Managed Areas Data, Feb. 1992

Source  : Several National maps
Publication Date : vary
Projection : Mercator, mentioned when different
Related Datasets     :     White vegtation map
Keywords : WCMC, Forests.

The Legend is in all coverages under ITEM VEGN
AREA               = gives the rea of the polygon in the map units
PERIMETER   = gives the perimeter of the polygon in map units
XXXVEG#   and XXXVEG-ID   = internal Arc/Info number
VEGN                - The Forest classification as explained above
VEGETATION = Gives the legend name corresponding to the VEGN item (not all
coverages have this)
title: WCMC Closed Moist Tropical Forest of Gabon (Classification of Forest Types)
